description:
Omigawd Silas is sexy!
He is mostly of Irish descent, byt I think he got a healthy dose of Italian (and hung like one too). He's got that great greco-roman curly hair that you find on a Michelangelo statue. Not to mention a smile that will break your heart. His skin is as smooth as polished marble too. A total package!
Silas is a 10 percenter. I think he's about 90 percent straight and about 10 percent gay. His main goal is to land the ladies, has a huge fondness for lesbian porn, but has been known on very few occasions to play with a dude.
Normally when the guys tell me they have played with a guy, it's usually that they got oral. But he says he's pretty much done everything with a guy, so I am gonna quickly move him to a full on action scene. He appears to have very few limits. He's gonna be a hard one to put a label on. He's just sexual.
Silas has a very interesting jack-off technique. He's not really a pillow fucker, but he likes to be face down fucking his fist. A bit challenging to film, but if you are more interested in the back door, you get a lot of chance to see his ass.
I also have to admit it was cool to get a guy to fuck the couch arm. It's different from the standby jack off, and you really get to see his stick in action.
And look for him later this week in full action!
title: Silas - Solo
